body_html:
In the previous CI build, Windows exit code was not propagating correctly and the failed build was marked as success (https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/10441/console). We need to check that this doesn't happen before merging.

cc. @peterjc123
body_text:
In the previous CI build, Windows exit code was not propagating correctly and the failed build was marked as success (https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/10441/console). We need to check that this doesn't happen before merging.
cc. @peterjc123
body:
In the previous CI build, Windows exit code was not propagating correctly and the failed build was marked as success (https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-build/10441/console). We need to check that this doesn't happen before merging.

cc. @peterjc123
